field.name: summary
field.value: WebLogger Throws When Logging Outside of an HttpContext

field.name: description
field.value:
The Log method doesn't check if there is an HttpContext before trying to use TraceContext.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Make an application that uses the Logging facility with the WebLogger. 2. In the application try to Log something in Application_End or other place outside of a normal request. 3. WebLogger will throw an exception at line 68.
Attached is a patch and a test fixture for this one issue. Thanks!
